AT.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
AT.description: Greife zu den Waffen und schließe dich in Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, einem Rail-Shooter im Arcade-Stil für Nintendo 3DS™, einer Elite-Einheit an. Wähle eines der drei Charakterprofile, die alle unterschiedliche Eigenschaften haben, sprenge dir mit Köpfchen und viel Muskelkraft (oder auch nur Muskelkraft) deinen Weg durch mehrere gefahrvolle Schauplätze am Boden, in Fahrzeugen und in der Luft. Und da du gerade in Schusslaune bist, kannst du Zusatzpunkte durchs Zerstören der Umgebung erzielen. Jeder Sieg lässt dich einen militärischen Rang aufsteigen, was dir zunehmend stärkere und durch Upgrades weiter zu verbessernde Waffen einbringt. Du wirst übernatürliche Reflexe und eine Ich-geb-niemals-auf-Einstellung benötigen, um den Frieden im stets explosiven Nahen Osten wiederherzustellen. Wirst du eine Special Operations-Legende sein, nachdem der Rauch verflogen ist?

BG.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
BG.description: Gear up and join an elite Special Forces unit in Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, an arcade-style on-rail shooter for Nintendo 3DS™. Choose from three character profiles, each with unique attributes, and use a combination of brains and brawn (but mostly brawn) to blast your way through a variety of dangerous ground, vehicle and air-based stages. And if you’re really feeling trigger-happy, you can earn additional points by blowing up the environment. Each victory sees your military rank rise, earning you increasingly powerful and upgradeable weapons. You’ll need preternatural reflexes and a never-say-die spirit to restore peace in the ever-volatile Middle East. When the smoke clears, will you be a Special Operations legend?

BE.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
BE.description: Prépare-toi à rejoindre une brigade d'élite des Forces Spéciales dans Heavy Fire Special Operations 3D, un jeu de tir sur rail type arcade sur Nintendo 3DS™. Choisis parmi trois personnages, chacun ayant ses propres caractéristiques, et combine corps et esprit pour te frayer un chemin sur de dangereux territoires à bord de véhicules et dans les airs. Et si tu as la gachette facile, tu recevras des points bonus en détruisant le décor. Chaque victoire te permet de monter en grade et de gagner des armes que tu peux améliorer pour les rendre plus puissantes. Tu auras besoin de réflexes surdéveloppés et d'un instinct de combattant pour rétablir la paix au Moyen-Orient. Seras-tu devenu une légende des Forces Spéciales une fois ta mission accomplie ?

ES.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
ES.description: Prepárate y únete a la unidad especial de élite en Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, un juego de tiroteo de agilidad para Nintendo 3DS™. Elige uno de los 3 personajes de características únicas y supera la multitud de etapas en tierra firme, en el aire o conduciendo vehículos. Y si tienes muchas ganas de disparar, puedes conseguir puntos adicionales por destruir elementos de tu entorno. Con cada victoria asciendes en la jerarquía militar y recibes armas cada vez más fuertes que puedes mejorar en la tienda. Necesitarás unos reflejos sobrenaturales y un espíritu de lucha invencible para devolver la paz a la inestable región de Oriente Medio. ¿Serás leyenda de Special Operations en cuanto caiga la cortina de humo?

IT.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
IT.description: Munisciti di coraggio e unisciti all’unità scelta delle forze speciali di Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, uno sparatutto arcade per Nintendo 3DS™. Scegli uno dei tre personaggi a disposizione, ognuno con caratteristiche specifiche, e usa ingegno e muscoli (più muscoli che altro) per farti strada attraverso numerosi combattimenti d’aria, di terra e sui mezzi. Se ti piace eccellere in questo genere, cimentati in Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D e ottieni punti extra distruggendo tutto ciò che ti circonda. Ogni vittoria ti farà aumentare di grado e permetterà di potenziare le tue armi. Avrai bisogno di una prontezza di riflessi e di uno spirito fuori dal comune per riportare la pace nella regione inquieta del Medio Oriente. Quando il fumo si dissolverà, riuscirai a diventare parte della leggenda "Special Operations"?

Each victory sees your military rank rise, earning you increasingly powerful and upgradeable weapons. You’ll need preternatural reflexes and a never-say-die spirit to restore peace in the ever-volatile Middle East. When the smoke clears, will you be a Special Operations legend?

NL.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
NL.description: Hou je paraat en sluit je aan bij de elitetroepen van Special Forces in Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, een arcadestijl on-rail schietspel voor Nintendo 3DS™. Kies een van de drie personages met unieke attributen, baan jezelf een weg door de verschillende etappes en lever strijd op de grond, in de lucht of vanuit een voertuig. En als je echt zin hebt om te schieten, verzamel dan extra punten door de hele omgeving overhoop te knallen. Met elke overwinning kom je een trapje hoger op de militaire ladder en krijg je steeds krachtigere wapens die je kunt verbeteren. Je hebt bovennatuurlijke reflexen en een onoverwinnelijke strijdlust nodig om de vrede te herstellen in het kruitvat van het Midden-Oosten. En als de rook optrekt, word je dan ook een Special Operations legende?

PL.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
PL.description: Gear up and join an elite Special Forces unit in Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, an arcade-style on-rail shooter for Nintendo 3DS™. Choose from three character profiles, each with unique attributes, and use a combination of brains and brawn (but mostly brawn) to blast your way through a variety of dangerous ground, vehicle and air-based stages. And if you’re really feeling trigger-happy, you can earn additional points by blowing up the environment. Each victory sees your military rank rise, earning you increasingly powerful and upgradeable weapons. You’ll need preternatural reflexes and a never-say-die spirit to restore peace in the ever-volatile Middle East. When the smoke clears, will you be a Special Operations legend?

PT.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
PT.description: Equipa-te e junta-te a uma unidade de Forças Especiais de elite em Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, um jogo de disparos ao estilo das arcadas para a Nintendo 3DS™. Escolhe entre três perfis de personagens, cada um dos quais com atributos únicos e utiliza uma combinação de inteligência e músculos (mas principalmente músculos) para abrires caminho por entre uma variedade de níveis terrestres, com veículos e aéreos. E se quiseres dar uso ao gatilho, podes ganhar pontos adicionais destruindo o meio envolvente. Cada vitória aumenta o teu ranking militar, dando-te armas mais potentes e personalizáveis. Vais precisar de poderes sobrenaturais e um espírito que não teme a morte para repores a paz no Médio Oriente sempre instável. Quando o fumo desaparecer, serás uma lenda das Operações Especiais?

RU.name: Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D
RU.description: Станьте элитным бойцом спецназа в Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D — новом аркадном рельсовом шутере для Nintendo 3DS. Выбирайте из трех различных персонажей с уникальными особенностями и отправляйтесь прямиком на поле боя. Используйте реакцию и сноровку, чтобы пробиться сквозь толпы противников в транспорте или пешком, на земле и в воздухе! Разрушайте постройки и зарабатывайте дополнительные очки, повышайте свой ранг после каждой миссии и покупайте новое оружие. Чтобы восстановить мир на Ближнем Востоке, игроку потребуются сила духа и скорость реакции. Станьте настоящей живой легендой спецназа!

SE.description: Gear up and join an elite Special Forces unit in Heavy Fire: Special Operations 3D, an arcade-style on-rail shooter for Nintendo 3DS™.
